metadata.title: CVE-2011-3818 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: WordPress 2.9.2 and 3.0.4 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated by wp-admin/includes/user.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
